TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XxHash128 extends System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm
Public NotInheritable Class XxHash128 Inherits NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm

Docs.summary: Provides an implementation of the XXH128 hash algorithm for generating a 128-bit hash.
Docs.remarks: For methods that persist the computed numerical hash value as bytes, the value is written in the Big Endian byte order.
